snippet: Mr. Hannigan was a former executive director of the United States Golf Association who offered blunt opinions on television and in print long after he retired.
abstract: Frank Hannigan, former executive director of United States Golf Assn who offered blunt opinions on television and in print long after he retired, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hannigan was a former executive director of the United States Golf Association who offered blunt opinions on television and in print long after he retired.
